metadata.title: CVE-2020-24265 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in tcpreplay tcpprep v4.3.3. There is a heap bufferoverflow vulnerability in MemcmpInterceptorCommon() that can make tcpprepcrash and cause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24265` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
